titleStmt.title: Euchologia: or, The doctrine of practical praying. By the Right Reverend Father in God, John Prideaux, late Bishop of Worcester. Being a legacy left to his daughters in private, directing them to such manifold uses of our Common Prayer Book. As may satisfie upon all occasions, without looking after new lights from extemporal flashes.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.

titleStmt.title: Euchologia: or, The doctrine of practical praying. By the Right Reverend Father in God, John Prideaux, late Bishop of Worcester. Being a legacy left to his daughters in private, directing them to such manifold uses of our Common Prayer Book. As may satisfie upon all occasions, without looking after new lights from extemporal flashes.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich. Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstans Church-yard, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: With engraved frontispiece portrait of Prideaux.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
